ground_truth: The waiter spoons a dollop of black caviar into Jack's dinner plate, and Rose smiles. Jack grins at Rose while Molly glares at Ruth. The waiter refills Jack's glass, and Jack tosses a box of matches to Cal. Rose raises her glass, and they all toast. Jack raises his glass to Rose, and Cal lifts his glass, frowns, and then sips. Later, a waiter pushes a cart laden with desserts as Jack hands a pen to Molly. Cal lobs the matches back to Jack, who slips them into his pocket and then approaches Rose. Rose smiles as Ruth stares at them. Jack kisses her hand and slips a note to Rose before turning and walking off, glancing back at her over his shoulder. As Ruth stares at her daughter, Rose gazes across the room toward the door. Beneath the skylight, Jack stands on the landing and faces the clock while Rose steps to the bottom of the staircase. Lifting her dress slightly, she ascends the stairs as Jack turns. Another play is a set of pipes where two men swing each other around on the platform as couples dance. Fabrizio dances with a blonde woman, Helga, placing his hand on her back while Jack, now with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up, dances with Cora, a little girl with dark hair. Some people clap their hands in time to the music as Rose sits at a table with blonde Bjorn, and Tommy sets down several glasses of beer, setting a beer in front of Rose. Rose claps her hands as she watches Jack. Nearby, a man falls to the floor, and two other men help him up while another hands the man his drink. Jack spins Cora as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth, and he waves Rose over. They stand on the dance floor as Jack pulls Rose close, with Cora standing and watching them. Cora smiles as Jack and Rose dance through the crowd, with Fabrizio and Helga climbing onto the platform to dance. Jack and Rose whirl around, and Jack pulls Rose by the arm to perform a special dance. Watching him, Rose pulls off her shoes, tosses them to a nearby woman, then holds up the hem of her dress. Jack smiles and claps his hands, and when he stops, Rose dances. They link arms and dance in a circle as other couples dance around them. Jack and Rose hold hands, face each other, and spin faster and faster. In the smoking room, a steward lights Cal's cigar while others talk or smoke cigars. Tommy and Bjorn arm wrestle as others cheer. Jack steps up to their table and, reaching over Bjorn, grabs two glasses of beer, handing one glass to Rose and then drinking from his own as Jack watches Rose gulp down most of her beer.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution

Certainly! Here is the transformed text with synonyms applied where possible:

The server scoops a portion of ebony roe onto Jack's supper platter, and Rose beams. Jack smirks at Rose while Molly glowers at Ruth. The server replenishes Jack's goblet, and Jack flings a carton of igniters to Cal. Rose lifts her goblet, and they all celebrate. Jack elevates his goblet to Rose, and Cal hoists his goblet, scowls, and then drinks. Afterwards, a server propels a trolley burdened with sweets as Jack gives a stylus to Molly. Fabrizio dances with a fair-haired woman, Helga, placing his hand on her back while Jack, now with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up, dances with Cora, a little girl with dark hair. Some people clap their hands in time to the music as Rose sits at a table with blonde Bjorn, and Tommy sets down several glasses of ale, setting an ale in front of Rose. Rose claps her hands as she watches Jack. Nearby, a man falls to the floor, and two other men help him up while another hands the man his drink. Jack spins Cora as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth, and he waves Rose over. They stand on the dance floor as Jack pulls Rose close, with Cora standing and watching them. Cora beams as Jack and Rose dance through the throng, with Fabrizio and Helga climbing onto the platform to dance. Jack and Rose whirl around, and Jack pulls Rose by the arm to perform a special dance. Watching him, Rose removes her footwear, tosses them to a nearby woman, then holds up the hem of her gown. test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
The waiter, with a practiced elegance, gently spoons a generous dollop of exquisite black caviar onto Jack's dinner plate, causing Rose to smile warmly. Jack, full of delight, grins broadly at Rose, while nearby, Molly casts a stern glare at Ruth. The attentive waiter refills Jack's glass with a fluid motion, prompting Jack to nonchalantly toss a small box of matches over to Cal. In a gesture of celebration, Rose raises her glass high, and they all join in the toast with cheerful clinks of their glasses. Jack follows suit by lifting his glass to Rose, catching her gaze, while Cal, somewhat reluctantly, raises his glass, frowns slightly, and then takes a contemplative sip. 

Later, the scene shifts as a waiter carefully maneuvers a cart brimming with an array of decadent desserts, while Jack discreetly hands a pen to Molly. Cal, with a casual flick of the wrist, lobs the matches back to Jack, who deftly slips them into his pocket before approaching Rose with a confident stride. Rose greets him with a radiant smile, even as Ruth's eyes remain fixed on them in scrutiny. In a romantic gesture, Jack gently kisses Rose's hand and subtly passes a note to her before turning away to walk off, casting a final glance over his shoulder to maintain their connection. As Ruth continues to stare intently at her daughter, Rose finds herself gazing across the opulent room toward the grand door.

Standing under the expansive skylight, Jack positions himself on the grand landing, facing the ornate clock while Rose elegantly steps to the bottom of the majestic staircase. Lifting her dress slightly to ease her ascent, she begins to climb the stairs, Jack turning to observe her approach. Meanwhile, another lively spectacle unfolds as a duo of men swing each other around energetically on a platform, accompanied by couples dancing to the infectious rhythm. In the midst of it all, Fabrizio finds himself partnering with a blonde woman named Helga, affectionately placing his hand on her back, while Jack, now freer in appearance with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up, energetically dances with Cora, a young girl with dark hair. The lively music inspires some onlookers to clap their hands in rhythm as Rose sits at a nearby table with blonde Bjorn, and Tommy sets down a collection of frothy glasses of beer, placing one directly in front of Rose.

As Rose claps her hands enthusiastically in time to the music, her eyes remain glued to Jack. Nearby, there's a commotion as a man takes an unexpected tumble to the floor, with two other men quickly stepping in to assist him back up, while another offers the man his drink with a reassuring gesture. Jack, caught up in the joyful atmosphere, spins Cora around as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth in playful harmony, prompting Jack to wave Rose over enthusiastically. Together, they take their place on the lively dance floor, where Jack pulls Rose close with an affectionate embrace while Cora stands by and watches them with a smile. Cora beams with delight as Jack and Rose dance fluidly through the bustling crowd, with Fabrizio and Helga energetically climbing onto the platform to continue dancing. Jack and Rose whirl around each other joyfully, and Jack pulls Rose by the arm to initiate a special dance sequence. Watching Jack closely, Rose grins and quickly removes her shoes, playfully tossing them to a nearby woman, before holding up the hem of her dress to join in fully. Jack claps his hands in encouragement and, upon stopping, watches with satisfaction as Rose begins to dance. They link arms cooperatively and dance in a circle, surrounded by other couples who move around them in a harmonious swirl. With a shared sense of exhilaration, Jack and Rose hold hands, facing each other directly, and begin to spin faster and faster in joyful abandon.

In a contrasting environment of leisurely sophistication, a steward in the smoking room provides attentive service by lighting Cal's cigar, while others in the room engage in conversation or enjoy smoking their cigars. Meanwhile, Tommy and Bjorn engage in a spirited arm-wrestling match, with enthusiastic cheers from onlookers providing an animated backdrop. Jack approaches their table with a confident air and, reaching across Bjorn with ease, grabs hold of two glasses of beer. He hands one to Rose with a nod of shared camaraderie and then takes a swig from his own glass, watching with admiration as Rose eagerly gulps down most of her beer with gusto.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
The waiter, moving with an air of practiced elegance and grace, gently and skillfully spoons a generous, sumptuous dollop of exquisite black caviar onto Jack's dinner plate. This act causes Rose to break into a warm, appreciative smile. Jack, filled with delight and joy, grins broadly at Rose, while nearby, Molly casts a stern and disapproving glare in Ruth's direction. The ever-attentive waiter, not missing a beat, refills Jack's glass with a smooth, fluid motion, prompting Jack to casually and nonchalantly toss a small box of matches over to Cal. In a gesture that signifies celebration and unity, Rose raises her glass high in the air, and they all join in the toast, their glasses clinking together with cheerful enthusiasm and shared camaraderie. Jack follows suit by lifting his glass in a salute to Rose, catching her gaze with a meaningful look, while Cal, somewhat reluctantly, raises his glass as well, frowning slightly as he takes a contemplative sip.

As the scene transitions to a later moment, we observe a waiter carefully maneuvering a cart that is brimming with an array of decadent, tempting desserts. Meanwhile, Jack discreetly hands a pen to Molly. Cal, with a casual flick of his wrist, lobs the matches back to Jack, who deftly slips them into his pocket before approaching Rose with a confident and self-assured stride. Rose greets him with a radiant, welcoming smile, even as Ruth's eyes remain fixed on them with scrutiny and suspicion. In a romantic and tender gesture, Jack gently kisses Rose's hand and subtly passes a note to her before turning away to walk off, casting a final, lingering glance over his shoulder to maintain their heartfelt connection. As Ruth continues to stare intently and unwaveringly at her daughter, Rose finds herself gazing across the opulent, grand room toward the majestic door.

Standing under the vast, expansive skylight, Jack positions himself on the grand landing, facing the ornate, decorative clock as Rose elegantly steps to the bottom of the majestic, sweeping staircase. Lifting her dress slightly to ease her ascent, she begins to climb the stairs with poise and grace, while Jack turns to observe her approach with admiration. Meanwhile, another lively spectacle unfolds around them as a duo of men energetically swing each other around on a platform, accompanied by couples dancing to the infectious, lively rhythm. In the midst of this joyful commotion, Fabrizio finds himself partnering with a blonde woman named Helga, affectionately placing his hand on her back. Jack, now appearing freer with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up, energetically dances with Cora, a young girl with dark hair. The lively music inspires some onlookers to clap their hands in rhythm as Rose sits at a nearby table with the blonde-haired Bjorn. Tommy sets down a collection of frothy glasses of beer, placing one directly in front of Rose.

As Rose claps her hands enthusiastically in time to the infectious music, her eyes remain glued to Jack. Nearby, there's a commotion as a man takes an unexpected, sudden tumble to the floor, while two other men quickly step in to assist him back up. Another man offers the fallen man his drink with a reassuring gesture. Jack, caught up in the joyful, vibrant atmosphere, spins Cora around as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth in playful harmony, prompting Jack to wave Rose over enthusiastically. Together, they take their place on the lively, bustling dance floor, where Jack pulls Rose close with an affectionate embrace, while Cora stands by and watches them with a joyful smile. Cora beams with delight as Jack and Rose dance fluidly through the bustling, energetic crowd, with Fabrizio and Helga energetically climbing onto the platform to continue their spirited dancing. Jack and Rose whirl around each other joyfully, and Jack pulls Rose by the arm to initiate a special dance sequence. Watching Jack closely, Rose grins and quickly removes her shoes, playfully tossing them to a nearby woman, before holding up the hem of her dress to join in fully. Jack claps his hands in encouragement and, upon stopping, watches with satisfaction as Rose begins to dance with spirited enthusiasm. They link arms cooperatively and dance in a circle, surrounded by other couples who move around them in a harmonious, swirling motion. With a shared sense of exuberance and exhilaration, Jack and Rose hold hands, facing each other directly, and begin to spin faster and faster in joyful abandon.

In a contrasting environment characterized by leisurely sophistication, a steward in the smoking room provides attentive, meticulous service by lighting Cal's cigar, while others in the room engage in casual conversation or enjoy smoking their cigars in contentment. Meanwhile, Tommy and Bjorn engage in a spirited, competitive arm-wrestling match, with enthusiastic cheers from onlookers providing an animated and lively backdrop. Jack approaches their table with a confident air and, reaching across Bjorn with ease, grabs hold of two glasses of beer. He hands one to Rose with a nod of shared camaraderie and understanding, then takes a swig from his own glass, watching with admiration as Rose eagerly gulps down most of her beer with gusto and enthusiasm.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The waiter carefully spoons a generous dollop of black caviar onto Jack's dinner plate, catching Rose's eye and prompting a smile from her. Observing this, Jack grins warmly at Rose, while Molly glances sharply at Ruth, who is sitting nearby. The waiter then attentively refills Jack's glass, ensuring it is filled to the brim. In a nonchalant manner, Jack flicks his wrist and tosses a box of matches to Cal, who effortlessly catches it. With a sense of unity, Rose lifts her glass high, prompting everyone to join her as they all raise their glasses for a collective toast. Jack focuses intently on Rose as he lifts his glass to meet hers in a silent toast, while Cal lifts his own glass, hesitating for a moment with a frown before taking a sip. As time progresses, a waiter diligently maneuvers a dessert cart laden with sweet treats, weaving through the tables, while Jack reaches into his pocket and hands Molly a pen, prompting a curious exchange. Cal, in a playful gesture, casually lobs the matches back to Jack, who skillfully catches them, slips them back into his pocket, and then makes his way over to Rose. Experiencing an affectionate moment, Rose responds with a warm smile even as Ruth fixes a pointed stare at them. Demonstrating gallantry, Jack gently lifts Rose's hand to his lips for a delicate kiss, subtly slipping her a note before he turns, strides away, yet takes a moment to look back at her over his shoulder in a lasting glance. As Ruth continues to fixate on her daughter, Rose's gaze wanders across the room, eventually resting towards the door. Positioned under the skylight, Jack stands confidently on the landing, facing the clock with resolve, while Rose gracefully steps to the base of the staircase. With a practiced motion, she delicately lifts her dress slightly and elegantly ascends the stairs, capturing Jack's attention as he turns to watch her approach. Meanwhile, in another lively setting, two men demonstrate their strength and coordination by swinging each other around on a set of pipes, enhancing the festive atmosphere as couples dance energetically to the music around them. Fabrizio, with his hand placed gently on Helga's back, dances with her, while Jack, now in a more relaxed state with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up, joyfully dances with Cora, a little girl with dark hair. The captivating scene continues as some onlookers clap their hands in rhythm to the lively music. Seated at a table with a blonde-haired man named Bjorn, Rose enjoys the scene. Tommy approaches and sets down several glasses of beer, placing a beer decisively in front of Rose, who claps her hands in delight as she keeps her eyes on Jack. Amidst this lively gathering, a man loses his balance and falls to the floor, prompting two others to rush to his aid, helping him back to his feet while another bystander retrieves and hands him his drink. Immersed in the music, Jack spins Cora around with joyous energy as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth in a playful dance, causing Jack to enthusiastically wave Rose over to join them. Jack and Rose make their stand on the dance floor, and he draws her in close, enveloping her in the moment while Cora looks on, captivated. Watching them dance, Cora beams with delight as Jack and Rose navigate the crowd with fluid movements, while Fabrizio and Helga ascend the platform to showcase their dance. Whirling together, Jack and Rose become a dynamic pair, and Jack playfully pulls Rose's arm to guide her into a dance that feels special and unique. In response to his lead, Rose watches him closely, then with determination, she kicks off her shoes, sending them toward a nearby woman for safekeeping, and lifts the hem of her dress to allow for more freedom. Captivated by her spirit, Jack beams with appreciation and claps his hands in rhythm, setting the tone for her to dance. She responds to his encouragement, and they link arms, dancing in a circular motion while surrounded by other dancing couples. As their connection intensifies, Jack and Rose clasp hands, facing each other as they spin faster and faster, creating a shared whirlwind of joy and spontaneity. Meanwhile, in the smoking room, a steward provides attentive service to Cal by carefully lighting his cigar, while others around them engage in lively discussions or enjoy their cigars. Amid an atmosphere of camaraderie, Tommy and Bjorn engage in a spirited arm-wrestling match, their efforts cheered on by the enthusiastic crowd. Jack approaches their table with a confident stride, reaching over Bjorn to deftly grab two glasses of beer, offering one to Rose with a gesture of inclusion before raising his own glass to drink. As the evening unfolds, Jack observes with a sense of admiration as Rose eagerly gulps down most of her beer, sharing in the revelry and camaraderie of the moment.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
The waiter serves Jack a dollop of black caviar, prompting smiles from Rose and a glare from Molly to Ruth. As the waiter refills his glass, Jack tosses a box of matches to Cal. They toast together, with Cal frowning before sipping his drink. Later, as a dessert cart passes, Jack hands a pen to Molly and retrieves the matches tossed back by Cal before approaching Rose, exchanging smiles with her while Ruth watches coldly. Jack kisses Rose’s hand, discreetly slipping her a note before departing with a backward glance. Under the skylight, Jack stands by the clock while Rose, lifting her dress slightly, ascends the staircase toward him.

Meanwhile, at a lively party, couples dance, Fabrizio enjoys the company of Helga, and Jack energetically dances with Cora, a little girl. Rose sits nearby with Tommy and Bjorn, clapping to the music as a beer is set in front of her. Amidst the chaos of spilled drinks and laughter, Jack signals Rose to join him on the dance floor. They dance closely, with Cora watching, then whirl energetically as Fabrizio and Helga take the platform. Rose removes her shoes, tossing them aside to fully embrace the dance with Jack. They hold hands and spin in a circle, joined by other couples. 

In the smoking room, Cal lights a cigar as men discuss and smoke, while Tommy and Bjorn arm wrestle to cheers. Jack arrives, grabs two beers, and hands one to Rose, who drinks heartily, much to Jack's amusement.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The waiter, hailing from a renowned restaurant in the heart of Paris, spoons a dollop of black caviar, a delicacy known for its luxurious taste and high price, into Jack's dinner plate, and Rose smiles, recalling her first tasting experience on a visit to Russia. Jack grins at Rose while Molly, a sharp-witted socialite known for her candid demeanor, glares at Ruth with a hint of amusement. The waiter refills Jack's glass with an exquisite Bordeaux, and Jack tosses a box of matches, branded with the insignia of a prestigious London club, to Cal. Rose raises her glass, etched with an intricate pattern from a Venetian glassblower, and they all toast to new beginnings. Jack raises his glass to Rose, savoring the rich vintage, and Cal lifts his glass, frowns slightly, recalling a recent business setback, and then sips contemplatively. Later, a waiter pushes a cart laden with an array of decadent desserts, including a chocolate torte rumored to be favored by royalty, as Jack hands a pen, crafted by a renowned German brand, to Molly for a quick jot. Cal lobs the matches back to Jack, who slips them into his pocket and then approaches Rose with a confident stride. Rose smiles warmly as Ruth, a woman of traditional values, stares at them with disapproval. Jack kisses her hand, a gesture reminiscent of old-world chivalry, and slips a note to Rose containing a heartfelt message before turning and walking off, glancing back at her over his shoulder with a mischievous grin. As Ruth stares at her daughter, Rose gazes pensively across the room toward the door that leads to the grand ballroom. Beneath the skylight, a masterpiece of stained glass installed in the 19th century, Jack stands on the landing and faces the clock, a majestic piece crafted by a celebrated horologist, while Rose steps to the bottom of the opulent marble staircase. Lifting her dress slightly, she ascends the stairs as Jack turns, smiling at her elegant ascent. Another play is a set of pipes where two men, adept acrobats from a traveling troupe, swing each other around on the platform as couples dance energetically to the lively Irish jig. Fabrizio, known for his zest for life, dances with a blonde woman, Helga, placing his hand on her back with a gentle confidence while Jack, now with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up in a carefree manner, dances with Cora, a little girl with dark hair and an infectious giggle. Some people clap their hands in time to the music, created by a lively band known for its spirited performances, as Rose sits at a table with blonde Bjorn, a seafarer with tales of adventure, and Tommy sets down several glasses of beer, a local brew prized for its rich flavor, setting a beer in front of Rose. Rose claps her hands in delight as she watches Jack. Nearby, a man, slightly tipsy from the evening's revelry, falls to the floor, and two other men help him up with good-natured laughter while another hands the man his drink, a whiskey known for its smooth finish. Jack spins Cora playfully as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth with synchronized steps, and he waves Rose over with a warm invitation. They stand on the dance floor as Jack pulls Rose close, with Cora standing and watching them with a bright smile. Cora smiles as Jack and Rose dance through the crowd, with Fabrizio and Helga climbing onto the platform to dance with exuberant joy. Jack and Rose whirl around, and Jack pulls Rose by the arm to perform a special dance learned during his travels abroad. Watching him, Rose pulls off her shoes, a stylish pair crafted by an Italian designer, tosses them to a nearby woman, then holds up the hem of her elegant dress. Jack smiles and claps his hands rhythmically, and when he stops, Rose dances with spontaneous grace. They link arms and dance in a circle as other couples, swept up by the music, dance around them. Jack and Rose hold hands, face each other, and spin faster and faster, losing themselves in the moment. In the smoking room, a steward with a meticulous attention to detail lights Cal's cigar, a premium blend from Cuba, while others talk or smoke cigars, enjoying the camaraderie. Tommy and Bjorn arm wrestle energetically as others cheer loudly. Jack steps up to their table and, reaching over Bjorn, grabs two glasses of beer, known for their robust character, handing one glass to Rose and then drinking from his own with a hearty gulp as Jack watches Rose gulp down most of her beer with a playful competitiveness.

As Ruth stares at her daughter Rose gazes across the room toward the door. Beneath the skylight Jack stands on the landing and faces the clock while Rose steps to the bottom of the staircase. Lifting her dress slightly she ascends the stairs as Jack turns. Another play is a set of pipes where two men swing each other around on the platform as couples dance. Fabrizio dances with a blonde woman Helga placing his hand on her back while Jack now with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up dances with Cora a little girl with dark hair. Some people clap their hands in time to the music as Rose sits at a table with blonde Bjorn and Tommy sets down several glasses of beer setting a beer in front of Rose. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. Rose claps her hands as she watches Jack. Nearby a man falls to the floor and two other men help him up while another hands the man his drink. Jack spins Cora as Fabrizio and Helga prance back and forth and he waves Rose over. They stand on the dance floor as Jack pulls Rose close with Cora standing and watching them. Cora smiles as Jack and Rose dance through the crowd with Fabrizio and Helga climbing onto the platform to dance. Jack and Rose whirl around and Jack pulls Rose by the arm to perform a special dance. Watching him Rose pulls off her shoes tosses them to a nearby woman then holds up the hem of her dress. Jack smiles and claps his hands and when he stops Rose dances. They link arms and dance in a circle as other couples dance around them. Jack and Rose hold hands face each other and spin faster and faster. In the smoking room a steward lights Cal's cigar while others talk or smoke cigars. Tommy and Bjorn arm wrestle as others cheer. Jack steps up to their table and reaching over. Bjorn grabs two glasses of beer. handing one glass to Rose and then drinking from his own as Jack watches Rose gulp down most of her beer.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: The waiter spoons a dollop of black caviar into Jack's dinner plate and Rose smiles. Jack grins at Rose while Molly glares at Ruth. The waiter refills Jack's glass and Jack tosses a box of matches to Cal. Rose raises her glass and they all toast. Jack raises his glass to Rose and Cal lifts his glass frowns and then sips. Later a waiter pushes a cart laden with desserts as Jack hands a pen to Molly. Cal lobs the matches back to Jack who slips them into his pocket and then approaches Rose. Rose smiles as Ruth stares at them. Jack kisses her hand and slips a note to Rose before turning and walking off glancing back at her over his shoulder. As Ruth stares at her daughter Rose gazes across the room toward the door. Beneath the skylight Jack stands on the landing and faces the clock while Rose steps to the bottom of the staircase. Lifting her dress slightly she ascends the stairs as Jack turns. Another play is a set of pipes where two men swing each other around on the platform as couples dance. Fabrizio dances with a blonde woman Helga placing his hand on her back while Jack now with his tie removed and sleeves rolled up dances with Cora a little girl with dark hair. Some people clap their hands in time to the music as Rose sits at a table with blonde Bjorn and Tommy sets down several glasses of beer setting a beer in front of Rose. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The gardener sprinkles a pinch of red pepper onto Lisa's salad bowl, and Alex frowns. Lisa smirks at Alex while Harper glances at Nina. The gardener replenishes Lisa's cup, and Lisa flings a bundle of straws to Sam. Alex lowers his cup, and they all clink. Lisa lowers her cup to Alex, and Sam raises his cup, scowls, and then gulps. Later, a gardener drags a cart filled with pastries as Lisa hands a notebook to Harper. Sam tosses the straws back to Lisa, who tucks them into her bag and then heads toward Alex. Alex frowns as Nina watches them. Lisa pats her elbow and passes a card to Alex before turning and strolling away, peeking back at him over her shoulder. As Nina watches her kin, Alex peers across the chamber toward the window. Beneath the chandelier, Lisa stands on the platform and glances at the calendar while Alex steps to the apex of the ladder. Raising her coat slightly, she descends the ladder as Lisa pivots. Another spectacle is a row of benches where two kids swing each other around on the stage as groups jump. Gustavo skips with a brunette girl, Ingrid, putting his head on her shoulder while Lisa, now with her shoes removed and sleeves rolled up, skips with Liam, a little boy with bright hair. Some children stomp their feet in time to the rhythm as Alex sits at a counter with brunette Sven, and Ricky sets down several vases of juice, setting a juice in front of Alex. Alex stomps his feet as he observes Lisa. Nearby, a child drops to the ground, and two other kids assist him up while another hands the child his toy. Lisa twirls Liam as Gustavo and Ingrid leap back and forth, and she waves Alex over. They stand on the jumping zone as Lisa pulls Alex near, with Liam standing and looking at them. Liam frowns as Lisa and Alex jump through the mix, with Gustavo and Ingrid scrambling onto the stage to skip. Lisa and Alex twirl about, and Lisa pulls Alex by the leg to perform a unique jump. Observing her, Alex removes his hat, tosses it to a nearby boy, then holds up the cuff of his jacket. Lisa frowns and stomps his feet, and when he halts, Alex jumps. They link elbows and bounce in a loop as other groups jump around them. Lisa and Alex link arms, face each other, and twirl quicker and quicker. In the drawing room, a custodian extinguishes Sam's lantern while others chat or extinguish lanterns. Ricky and Sven thumb wrestle as others chant. Lisa steps up to their counter and, reaching over Sven, snatches two vases of juice, handing one vase to Alex and then sipping from her own as Lisa observes Alex sip down most of his juice.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The waiter serves black caviar to Jack, who exchanges smiles with Rose as they toast with Cal and Molly. Jack hands a pen to Molly, and playful exchanges with matches occur between him and Cal. Jack discreetly gives Rose a note, and they exchange glances before he departs. Rose later ascends a staircase toward Jack under a skylight. In a lively scene, Jack and others, including Fabrizio and Helga, dance with partners, while Rose watches. Jack invites Rose to the dance floor, and they joyfully whirl around. Removing her shoes, Rose joins Jack for a spirited dance, pleasing the crowd. Meanwhile, Cal smokes a cigar, and Tommy and Bjorn engage in arm wrestling. Jack fetches beer, sharing a moment with Rose as they enjoy the lively atmosphere.
